name: lfm
subject: bitcoind transaction to ip address
content: I cant figure out how to send a transaction to an ip address from bitcoind command line interface. Has the function been implemented yet? (linux 64 if it matters)

name: satoshi
subject: Re: bitcoind transaction to ip address
content:
It's not implemented.

It turned out nobody liked that mode of transfer anyway, so it hasn't had much development attention.
